column2: Like the mighty Yugoslavia to the south, the Western Slav brothers must unite under one banner and do away with the borders that have long divided us.

Legends say that at one time all Slavs where united as brothers. But the great disaster that befell our world tore us apart. It was Yugoslavia in the south that showed that not all hope of reunification was lost and like the Southern Slavs, it was only time that the Western Slavs would find common ground and reunite themselves.\n\nIt was [e_zapadoslavia.Holder.GetTitledNameWithNick] who finally brought the Western Slavs together, naming the new realm Zapadoslavia. Throughout the realm, Poles, Czechs and Slovaks celebrate this momentous occasion.
Together we will stand as brothers.
